episodes.summary: Today’s episode explores the massive $100 billion investment reshaping the AI arms race and the physical infrastructure bottlenecks threatening to slow it down. We also dive into a shifting housing market where buyers are gaining leverage despite a deepening affordability crisis, and examine critical global tensions between the U.S. and Iran. The show concludes with a look at the future of the blues in Chicago through the eyes of a local legend.
